mapper.insert: INSERT INTO onsale ( id, order_num, price, amount, remain, start_time, end_time, listing_status, sale_price, sku_code, product_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderNum}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{remain}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{listingStatus}, #{salePrice}, #{skuCode}, #{productId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE onsale SET order_num = #{orderNum}, price = #{price}, amount = #{amount}, remain = #{remain}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, listing_status = #{listingStatus}, sale_price = #{salePrice}, sku_code = #{skuCode} WHERE id = #{id}
